heading: Google Books Search
overview: Search for any book on Google books, then add it to your saved books page or find out more about the book with a link to the google book page

heading: Dayplanner
overview: Organise your workday into 1hour sections color-coded by past, present and future

heading: Eat-Da-Burger
overview: Create your own burger and consume it!

heading: Employee Directory
overview: View a (fictional) employee database, sort by name or use a fuzzy search to find an employee

heading: Password Generator
overview: Random password Generator with copy to clipboard feature

heading: Code Quiz
overview: Answer coding questions against the clock!

heading: Weather Dashboard
overview: Check the weather anywhere in the world
tech: JQuery, Moment API, openweathermap API, Bootstrap

heading: Express Notetaker
tech: Express.js, Node.js including inquirer and axios packages

heading: Fitness Tracker
overview: Create and track daily workouts. Look at pretty graphs showing what you have achieved
